titleInfo.title: Ray Pillow Tom Pall Glaser Brother at the Shoal Creek County Music Park

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red on yellow) announcing Ray Pillow, Tompall and the Glaser Brothers at the Shoal Creek Country Music Park on August 23. Poster features metal photoplates of Ray Pillow and Tompall and the Glaser Brothers.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
